content:
The enemy on Friday in the morning carried out a massive rocket attack on Zaporozhye.

About thisreportedHead of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov.

In total, the Russians have struck 12 rocket strokes. Pre -7 houses are destroyed, 35 were damaged.

There are wounded, the number of victims is specified.

Ivan Fedorov informed that the Zaporizhzhya NPP was again on the verge of Blackau-during a massive rocket attack on Ukraine at 5:10 in the morning, the outer air line of PL-750kv "Dniprovskaya" was switched off.

It connects the temporarily occupied Zaporizhzhya NPP with the united energy system of Ukraine.

Currently, the NPP is associated with the Ukrainian energy system of power transmission line of PL-330kV "Zaporizhzhya TPP-Ferroallovna", which was only repaired last week by the forces of Ukrainian energy after the next Russian shelling.

The second day in a row, Russia causes rocket strokes in Ukraine. On Thursday, there was a massacre on Kiev, today other regional centers and critical infrastructure were fired.
title: The enemy has struck 12 rocket strokes in Zaporozhye, NPE on the verge of Blackout
description: The head of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov informed about it. In total, the Russians have inflicted 12 ...
author: Army Inform
